content.query:
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE extRentals;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE extRentals (
	[TransactionId] nvarchar(256),
	[CustomerId] nvarchar(256),
	[MovieId] nvarchar(256),
	[RentalDate] date,
	[ReturnDate] date,
	[RentalCost] numeric(5,2),
	[LateFee] numeric(5,2),
	[RewindFlag] bit,
	[CreatedDate] date,
	[UpdatedDate] date,
	[DataSourceId] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Rentals',
	DATA_SOURCE = [silver_southridgedatalake02_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDeltaFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.extRentals
GO
